Intrigue Skills.description: Skills from the intrigue skill group are used in tasks centered around investigation, thievery, and spycraft.

options.name: Alertness
options.description: Intuitively sense the details of your surroundings

options.name: Conceal Object
options.description: Hide an object on your person or in your environment

options.name: Disguise
options.description: Change your appearance to look like a different person

options.name: Eavesdrop
options.description: Actively listen to something that is hard to hear, such as a whispered conversation through a door

options.name: Escape Artist
options.description: Escape from bonds such as rope or manacles

options.name: Pick Lock
options.description: Open a lock without using the key

options.name: Pick Pocket
options.description: Steal an item that another person wears or carries without them noticing

options.name: Sabotage
options.description: Disable a mechanical device such as a trap

options.name: Search
options.description: Actively search an environment for important details and items

options.name: Track
options.description: Follow a trail that another creature has left behind
